name: Atari ST Audio File
summary: Learn about .YM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Nullsoft Winamp with V_Soft Vortex AY/YM Chip Emulator plug-in
Microsoft Internet Explorer with ST-Sound plug-in

content: Even though the Atari ST system has been discontinued, YM audio can still be played back with several Windows applications.

description: Audio file used by the Atari ST, an older computer system that was discontinued in the early 1990s; contains an audio loop or track that can be played back with the Atari ST YM chip; supports storage for the song name, author, comments, and the audio data itself.
